file-io/hdf-eos/mopitt/

read_mopitt.pro

Last modification:
Tue Oct 4 16:03:29 2005

topread_mopitt

result = read_mopitt(eos_file, field_name, longitude_interval, latitude_interval)

Extract data from a MOPITT data file. MOPITT data are HDF-EOS. Currently, the only data available from MOPITT are CO mixing ratio.

Parameters

eos_file        in type: string

The filepath to an HDF-EOS file containing MOPITT data.

field_name        in type: string

The name of the data field name for which data is to be obtained.

longitude_interval        in type: double

The range of longitudes in which to look for data.

latitude_interval        in type: double

The range of latitudes in which to look for data.
